messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Investigator Lewis and Chauffer Rodney Robinson were at the scene around 12:31am when they discovered a crucial piece of evidence. Technician Muhammad, who also arrived shortly after, took photographs of the scene. Sergeant McMullen briefed Detective Morton on the blood trail leading to North Derbignay Street. Detective Aucoin secured the residence after his investigation. Crime Lab Technician Tamika Rogers conducted tests at the Homicide Office. Detective Trehan's records at the Coroner's Office confirmed the nature of the deaths. Detective Morton and Orlando Mathews interviewed witnesses at the Homicide Office, while Detective Sergeant Chris Robert, Officer Juan Lopez, Officers Phil Burras & Quincy Broaden, Officers Nate Addison & Glen Hewitt, Detective Gregory Johnson, Detective Jason McGee, Detective Ananie Mitchell, and Detective Melvin McCullum were mentioned in relation to the case or investigation. Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer Gary Sallienger played a role in the scene sketch, and Detective Mathews compiled photographic line-ups. Detective Pratt of the Homicide Section was also involved in the investigation.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Was at the scene around 12:31am and discovered a crucial piece of evidence.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Chauffer Rodney RobinsonOfficer Context: Assisted Investigator Lewis at the scene.Officer Role: ChaufferOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Photographed the scene shortly after the evidence was discovered.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Context: Briefed Detective Morton on the blood trail leading to North Derbignay Street.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Detective MortonOfficer Context: Received a briefing from Sergeant McMullen and conducted interviews at the Homicide Office.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective AucoinOfficer Context: Secured the residence after his investigation.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Crime Lab Technician Tamika RogersOfficer Context: Conducted tests at the Homicide Office.Officer Role: Crime Lab TechnicianOfficer Name: Detective TrehanOfficer Context: Records at the Coroner's Office confirmed the nature of the deaths.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Sergeant Chris RobertOfficer Context: Mentioned in relation to the case.Officer Role: Detective SergeantOfficer Name: Officer Juan LopezOfficer Context: Mentioned in relation to the investigation.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Officers Phil Burras & Quincy BroadenOfficer Context: Mentioned as a team in relation to the investigation.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Officers Nate Addison & Glen HewittOfficer Context: Mentioned as a team in Morton.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective PrattOfficer Context: Was involved in the investigation as part of the Homicide Section.Officer Role: Detective
